dialogue.text: Beep boop ba?
Huh? Oh yeah, Yukari just wanted to talk to me real quick. Nothing to worry about honey bunches!
Bop skdeep!
Of course, hun! While going to Gensokyo was a nice detour, we still have that bar you wanted to go to!
What was it called again?
Bep bebop ba!
Old Adam! Thank you for reminding me!
GF pats BF’s butt with a sly smirk.
Your cute little butt helped me remember too~
Beep!
BF and GF make their way down the alleyways,  passing various tall buildings before eventually arriving at a comfy looking bar,  labelled Old Adam.
Oh wow,  this looks like one of those places that one guy with the cool shirt and car would go to!
I don’t know why,  but it just gives me that sort of vibe,  a feeling of familiarity and home.
Boop baap skbeep bo!
Heh,  funny you should mention that.  This place has some of the best food this side of town!
As well as some pretty good beer that helps getcha thinkin.
Oh really?  Well,  what do you recommend?
Come with me!  I’ll show ya the best meals and booze!
Beep boo!
Anytime little dude!  Now let’s go inside before it starts to rain.
With the way the clouds are forming,  rain will start to pour in about five seconds.
Renko leads GF and BF inside of the bar,  which was fairly busy with various guests enjoying a drink and some food.
A few of the patrons are people that BF and GF recognize,  who give them a little wave and a nod before Renko sits the two of them at a bar stool.
As soon as Renko led them inside,  rain starts to pour outside,  creating a relaxing atmosphere to this lo-fi establishment.
Now I personally recommend the spicy bean and apple curry.  Some of the best curry you can ever have!  And of course,  Oni's breath beer to drink all that down!
Oh!  That sounds wonderful!
Though sadly,  I’m allergic to beans.  Whenever I eat them,  I always get a rash and hives,  which always lasts for a while.
But I’m definitely interested in trying out the beer though!
Beep boop bop?
Yes,  I am allergic to beans honey.  Same with Mommy and Daddy.
I know I ate that one bean dish that your mom made for me,  but I didn’t want to refuse a meal she worked hard to make me.
Besides,  it was funny to see you scared when you thought your bed sheets caused my rash~
BEEEP!!!
Beep bo boop~
And I can’t stay mad at you either,  it’s like you always say.  I make your heart stop with love~
Ahahaha!  Well aren’t you two a couple of love birds huh?  Reminds me of my girl.
Oh by the way,  where are my manners?  The name is Renko Usami!  Co-founder of the Secret Sealing Club!
Oh!  You’re the one that my darling wanted to see!
Bep!
A rap battle you say?
Sure,  I don’t see why not!  Plus,  it can help pass the time while I wait for my partner too!
Why don’t you get me the usual and for my friends here,  let them have it too!
Though make sure you prep the food away from any beans,  I don’t want my new friend to have an allergic reaction.
Renko and BF get up to the small little stage,  as stage lights focus on the two of them with GF sitting on the speakers.
Now,  are ya ready pal?  Let’s have a good one!
